extension.name: OS-Property Category Menu
extension.author: Dang Thuc Dam
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2011 Ossolution Co.LTD. All rights reserved.
extension.description: Displays a list of OS Property categories and/or sub-categories in menu style.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable or div.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: menuclass_sfx
field.label: Menu Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items

field.name: ordering
field.label: Ordering
field.description: Ordering options: list order is the order specified in the VM Category Tree

field.name: level_start
field.label: Start Level
field.description: Level to start rendering the categories at

field.name: level_end
field.label: End Level
field.description: Level to stop rendering the categories at (if set to 0, it is ignored)

field.name: show_arrow
field.label: Show Arrow
field.description: Do you want to show Arrow before Category Names
